intro: Gynocephalum oblongum, commonly known as the slender leaf morning glory, is a flowering plant belonging to the Convolvulaceae family. It is characterized by its slender, twining stems and heart-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish-white flowers that bloom in the morning, hence its common name. It is native to regions of Africa and is often found in moist, open habitats. Gynocephalum oblongum is an annual herb that is sometimes cultivated for its ornamental value.
